metadata.title: CVE-2023-2618 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found inOpenCV wechat_qrcode Module up to 4.7.0. Affected by this issue is thefunction DecodedBitStreamParser::decodeHanziSegment of the fileqrcode/decoder/decoded_bit_stream_parser.cpp. The manipulation leads tomemory leak. The attack may be launched remotely. The name of the patch is2b62ff6181163eea029ed1cab11363b4996e9cd6. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability isVDB-228548.

criterions.comment: opencv package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
